data.eml:eml: Revision of Palaearctic and Oriental Necrophila Kirby & Spence, part 1: subgenus Deutosilpha Portevin (Coleoptera: Silphidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rúžička, Jan, Schneider, Jan (2011): Revision of Palaearctic and Oriental Necrophila Kirby & Spence, part 1: subgenus Deutosilpha Portevin (Coleoptera: Silphidae). Zootaxa 2987: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278355
